summary: Ubuntu 20.04.1 LTS It starts and works fine here

description: Dell M Series, Ubuntu 20.04 LTS, all latest updates / patches

The first start in Ubuntu 20.04 took really ages and I thought the reviewers who wrote it doesn't start at all are right. But since then, it starts quickly every time.

The program is not designed very well, it reacts quite slowly, but it offers many features, such as various ways to learn and practice Morse code. The effects section is absolutely impressive: It can emulate - and all at the same time! - noise, bandpass filtering, volume fading in and out, several background transmissions from simulated other channels.

As I have learned the characters in another program before I switched from Windows to Ubuntu (namely "Just Learn Morse Code"), the most important mode for me here in Koch Morse Trainer is the Random mode, where you can select from probably all the characters available internationally, nicely sorted into groups.

The program though has still some major bugs. The transmit mode, for instace, simply freeze-crashes the app for me every time I tried.

Overall a mixed experience, but still the best and most useful Morse trainer I found for Ubuntu/Linux so far.
summary: First Start Took Ages | Many Features | A Few Bugs

description: Works great! It installed easily and works seemlessly.  It seems that earlier issues reported have been worked out.
Extremely useful if just learning morse code or brushing up your receving skills.
I'm running Ubuntu and after it is installed it took a few minutes to come up. After that it runs great.
For some reason it takes a bit to start but works great. Good teaching method. I highly recommend it.
Das Programm lässt sich nicht starten, da 'libpulsecommon-11.1.so' fehlt und unter Ubuntu scheint diese Bibliothek nicht zu geben.

Unter Ubuntu 20.4.2 LTS läuft es hervorragend. Wollte eigentlich nicht wirklich Morsen lernen, das hatte ich schon bei der NVA. Dies ist nun 50 Jahre her, fand diesen Tutur durch Zufall. Konnte feststellen, das von damals einiges hängen geblieben ist, allerdings 110 ZPM funktonueren nicht mehr. Habe Lust auf Amateurfunk in mit geweckt. Sehr hilfreich sind auch die Hilfeanmerkungen und die Kochmthode auf der Webseite.
Nochmal: sehr empfehlenswert.
